item.title: the all hyped up .uk top level domain
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: .uk is the Internet country code top-level domain (ccTLD) for the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland. As of March 2012, it is the fourth most popular top-level domain worldwide (after .com, .de and .net), with over 10 million registrations. Starting 10th June 2014 it is now possible to register domains ending with a plain .uk. People may have wondered for ages as to why there were only .

item.title: my take on "The Reimagined Battlestar Galactica"
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: Coming from a perspective of being one of many serious Star Trek fans who have watched absolutely every episode and movie there is out there, presently I can't tell which of these I like better.

item.title: Inspirations 2017
item.author: cheret.en
item.description: I'm continuing my tradition of reflecting who inspired me in the past year and why.
